description: Retrieves information about each principal that is allowed to access a given Amazon OpenSearch Service domain through the use of an interface VPC endpoint.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenSearch Service domain to retrieve access information for.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedPrincipalList
nested_items.description: List of AuthorizedPrincipal describing the details of the permissions to manage VPC endpoints against the specified domain.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The IAM principal that is allowed access to the domain.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.
